**Insurance Disputes**

# Insurance Attorneys in Houston

## McDowell Law Group LLP Handles Insurance Disputes in Houston, TX & Beyond

McDowell Law Group, LLP is proud to provide experienced and knowledgeable
representation to insurance policy holders and beneficiaries in the Houston
area and throughout Texas.

Our insurance attorneys never represent the big insurance companies - we stand
up for people who need help getting what is fair in an insurance coverage
dispute. Make sure that you have a trusted legal ally who knows how to go
against these insurance giants.

**Schedule afree consultation with a life insurance lawyer in Houston today.
Contact McDowell Law Group LLP** **to find out how our firm can help you
resolve your claim.**

### Legal Assistance for All Insurance Claims

If your insurance claim has been denied, there is something you should know:
your insurance policy is a legal contract. If the insurance company is denying
your legitimate claim or taking advantage of you by dragging its feet in
investigating your loss or making the payments it promised, you may be able to
force them to live up to the terms of your contract and do what is right.

**McDowell Law Group, LLP is dedicated to assisting clients involved in a
dispute regarding a variety of types of insurance coverage, including:**

  * Life insurance policy
  * Healthcare coverage
  * Disability policy
  * Property and casualty coverage
  * Professional liability insurance
  * Homeowners insurance
  * Auto insurance, including uninsured and underinsured motorist coverage disputes
  * First party and third party claims

### Veteran Insurance Litigators Known for Results-Oriented Legal Counsel

Our decades of experience help us get results when litigating an insurance
coverage dispute. We are not afraid to go head to head with the big insurance
companies in cases of house fire claims or other significant property loss.

Our life insurance attorneys in Houston are committed to fighting for the
rights of insured Texans against all forms of bad faith insurance practices.

* * *

**To discuss your case in a free consultation,** **call our office** **at(713)
496-0504 to schedule an appointment with an insurance claim lawyer in
Houston.**

* * *

##### Insurance Disputes

  * Bad Faith Insurance
  * Wrongfully Denied Claims
